name: Pipe Dreams - Alpha 1
description: Horror game based around The Backrooms Creepypasta, Level 2. You play as a no-clipper and are recording with mid-quality camera. To escape you'll have to try and walk miles until you see white doors. Never go to red doors, they are not safe. Also, the game is at it's first Alpha Version, while also being my first game ever exposed to public so please be nice :) If you would like to share your opinions and feedback I feel free to join our Discord Server: https://discord.gg/jZ8THBgSFT and/or subscribe to my YouTube Channel to not miss any new devlog videos!
